articles.title: Realme GT 5G to launch in India before Diwali, confirms CEO - India Today
articles.description: The Realme GT 5G smartphone was recently launched in China and Europe, and it is now all set to be launched in the Indian market before Diwali.
articles.content: Realme GT 5G is set to launch in India before Diwali. In the recent Ask Madhav episode 27 Q&A series, where the CEO for India and Europe answers questions from the community. Realme India and Eur… [+2064 chars]

articles.author: Tom Gillespie
articles.title: COVID-19: Pilots criticise 'ludicrously cautious' travel rules and claim UK aviation sector is now hardest hit in Europe - Sky News
articles.description: BALPA's study shows Gatwick and Manchester airports are the worst affected in Europe, with Heathrow and Stansted close behind.

articles.author: Kenneth Fox
articles.title: Motorists could be in line for cheaper premiums after EU car insurance probe - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: The European Commission found Insurance Ireland breached EU antitrust rules, effectively restricting competition in the industry.
articles.content:
Motorists could be in line for cheaper premiums and refunds if the insurance industry is found to have blocked new players from entering the market.
